mapper.select: SELECT stu_id, stu_name, subject_id, subject_name, SUM(CASE WHEN lesson_type = 0 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END) AS total_lsn_cnt0, SUM(CASE WHEN lesson_type = 1 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END) AS total_lsn_cnt1, SUM(CASE WHEN lesson_type = 2 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END) AS total_lsn_cnt2 FROM v_info_lsn_statistics_by_stuid WHERE 1=1 AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM t_mst_student mst WHERE mst.stu_id = v_info_lsn_statistics_by_stuid.stu_id AND mst.del_flg = 0 ) AND lsn_month BETWEEN #{year_month_from} AND #{year_month_to} GROUP BY stu_id, stu_name, subject_id, subject_name ORDER BY stu_name, subject_id;
